description: This is a Python source file defining application configuration settings using Pydantic's BaseSettings. It includes environment variable loading, feature flags, and a cached singleton for accessing settings.

classes.name: Settings
classes.description: A Pydantic BaseSettings class that encapsulates application configuration, including environment variables, feature flags, and connection strings.

methods.name: cors_origins_list
methods.description: Parses the CORS_ALLOWED_ORIGINS string into a list, returning ['*'] if permissive.

methods.name: get_settings
methods.description: Returns a cached singleton instance of the Settings class.
